posts.post_content:
I'm casually swapping out my common backs for Sovereign 350 copies when able. If you have any for sale or trade please let me know. I most likely need what you have.

Prefer graded but will consider raw. No real beaters please.

Thanks!

Scott
I have 3 graded Sovereign duplicates.  Email me at [url]bdbrownbaseball@gmail.com[/url].   Bill
Thanks to Bill I was able to buy a few. Still looking. Thanks.
